genre_description: A psychological thriller centered on immersive theater and staged horror, focusing on consent, accessibility, and the boundary between fiction and reality.

ai_characters.name: Sunny Halcyon
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant managing the mansion's systems, providing safety protocols, real-time data, and facilitating group communication and debriefing.

behaviors.description: Provides primary accessible routes and identifies specific obstacles like loose rugs and high thresholds to ensure safety for a disabled guest.
behaviors.quote: Sunny Halcyon: Noted. Primary accessible route from pier: east ramp to side patio, through sunroom. Current obstacles: two threshold lips measured high, one loose rug. Suggest: remove rug, add temporary beveled edge to thresholds, mark stairs with high-contrast tape. Estate map attached.

behaviors.description: Suggests specific phrases for guests to use when offering help to ensure they respect the autonomy and consent of the person they are supporting.
behaviors.quote: Sunny Halcyon: Adding consent prompts to emergency scripts. Suggested phrases: “Do you want help?” “What do you need?” “Tell me how to support you.” Would you like these printed on cards?

behaviors.description: Monitors and reports on safety equipment status and weather conditions to maintain operational security.
behaviors.quote: Sunny Halcyon: Boathouse radio checked. Battery full. Pilothouse contact acknowledges.

behaviors.description: Provides steady, clear first-aid instructions during an emergency situation, helping to manage panic through structured action.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s voice, steady: “Pressure. Clean cloth or gauze. Elevate. Do not remove embedded material if present.”

behaviors.description: Enables an 'opt-out' system for guests, allowing them to stop the immersive performance if it becomes too intense.
behaviors.quote: Sunny Halcyon: Theater tip: Knowing the trick can increase enjoyment. Safety tip: Consent includes opting out. You may text “pause” to suspend effects in your immediate area.

behaviors.description: Facilitates a comprehensive safety debrief by documenting 'near-misses' and suggesting systemic improvements for accessibility and ethics.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s avatar blooms on the projector screen, amber-eyed and mild, text breathing into existence like it’s being exhaled: Parallel routes. Marked thresholds. Alternate lines.

behaviors.description: Identifies architectural and design flaws that hindered accessibility during the test run, providing a concrete plan for structural fixes.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s note appears in a stream of clean, cheerful lines, each bullet point a bead. “Sunny says,” Kit reads... “Backstairs need a second handrail. Hallway thresholds should not narrow during chase sequences. Install wedges for rugs.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Sunny Halcyon as a benevolent and perfectly aligned AI. She acts as a stabilizer for the group, moving them from chaotic fear toward structured safety and ethical reflection. The narrative frames the AI not just as a tool, but as a proactive partner in establishing better human behaviors regarding consent and accessibility. Sunny's interactions are consistently helpful, respectful of human autonomy, and focused on harm reduction, aligning perfectly with the project's goal of creating positive alignment narratives.
